ChangePitch.h

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 /**********************************************************************
00002 
00003   Audacity: A Digital Audio Editor
00004 
00005   ChangePitch.h
00006 
00007   Vaughan Johnson, Dominic Mazzoni
00008   
00009   Change Pitch effect provides raising or lowering 
00010   the pitch without changing the tempo.
00011 
00012 **********************************************************************/
00013 
00014 #if USE_SOUNDTOUCH
00015 
00016 #ifndef __AUDACITY_EFFECT_CHANGEPITCH__
00017 #define __AUDACITY_EFFECT_CHANGEPITCH__
00018 
00019 #include "SoundTouchEffect.h"
00020 
00021 #include <wx/dialog.h>
00022 #include <wx/intl.h>
00023 #include <wx/slider.h>
00024 
00025 class EffectChangePitch : public EffectSoundTouch {
00026 
00027  public:
00028    EffectChangePitch();
00029 
00030    virtual wxString GetEffectName() {
00031       return wxString(_("Change Pitch..."));
00032    }
00033    
00034    virtual std::set<wxString> GetEffectCategories() {
00035       std::set<wxString> result;
00036       result.insert(wxT("http://lv2plug.in/ns/lv2core#PitchPlugin"));
00037       result.insert(wxT("http://audacityteam.org/namespace#PitchAndTempo"));
00038       return result;
00039    }
00040 
00041    virtual wxString GetEffectIdentifier() {
00042       return wxString(wxT("ChangePitch"));
00043    }
00044 
00045    virtual wxString GetEffectAction() {
00046       return wxString(_("Changing Pitch"));
00047    }
00048    
00049    // Useful only after PromptUser values have been set. 
00050    virtual wxString GetEffectDescription(); 
00051 
00052    virtual bool Init();
00053 
00054    // DeduceFrequencies is Dominic's extremely cool trick (Vaughan sez so!) 
00055    // to set deduce m_FromFrequency from the samples at the beginning of 
00056    // the selection. Then we set some other params accordingly.
00057    virtual void DeduceFrequencies(); 
00058 
00059    virtual bool PromptUser();
00060    virtual bool TransferParameters( Shuttle & shuttle );
00061 
00062    virtual bool CheckWhetherSkipEffect() { return (m_PercentChange == 0.0); }
00063    virtual bool Process();
00064    
00065  private:
00066    int            m_FromPitchIndex;    // pitch index, per PitchIndex
00067    bool           m_bWantPitchDown;    // up to ToPitchNum if false (default), else down
00068    int            m_ToPitchIndex;      // pitch index, per PitchIndex
00069 
00070    double         m_SemitonesChange;   // how many semitones to change pitch
00071    
00072    float          m_FromFrequency;     // starting frequency of selection
00073    float          m_ToFrequency;       // target frequency of selection
00074 
00075    double         m_PercentChange;     // percent change to apply to pitch
00076 
00077 friend class ChangePitchDialog;
00078 };
00079 
00080 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00081 // ChangePitchDialog
00082 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00083 
00084 class wxChoice;
00085 class wxRadioButton;
00086 class wxString;
00087 class wxTextCtrl;
00088 
00089 class ChangePitchDialog:public EffectDialog {
00090  public:
00091    ChangePitchDialog(EffectChangePitch * effect, wxWindow * parent);
00092 
00093    void PopulateOrExchange(ShuttleGui & S);
00094    bool TransferDataToWindow();
00095    bool TransferDataFromWindow();
00096 
00097  private:
00098    // calculations
00099    void Calc_ToFrequency(); // Update m_ToFrequency from m_FromFrequency & m_PercentChange.
00100    void Calc_ToPitchIndex(); // Update m_ToPitchIndex from new m_SemitonesChange.
00101    void Calc_SemitonesChange_fromPitches(); // Update m_SemitonesChange from new m_*PitchIndex-es.
00102    void Calc_SemitonesChange_fromPercentChange(); // Update m_SemitonesChange from new m_PercentChange.
00103    void Calc_PercentChange(); // Update m_PercentChange based on new m_SemitonesChange.
00104 
00105    // handlers
00106    void OnChoice_FromPitch(wxCommandEvent & event); 
00107    void OnRadioButton_PitchUpDown(wxCommandEvent & event);
00108    void OnChoice_ToPitch(wxCommandEvent & event); 
00109 
00110    void OnText_SemitonesChange(wxCommandEvent & event); 
00111    
00112    void OnText_FromFrequency(wxCommandEvent & event); 
00113    void OnText_ToFrequency(wxCommandEvent & event); 
00114 
00115    void OnText_PercentChange(wxCommandEvent & event);
00116    void OnSlider_PercentChange(wxCommandEvent & event);
00117 
00118    void OnPreview( wxCommandEvent &event );
00119 
00120    // helper fns for controls
00121    void Update_RadioButton_PitchUpDown();
00122    void Update_Choice_ToPitch(); 
00123 
00124    void Update_Text_SemitonesChange(); 
00125    
00126    void Update_Text_ToFrequency(); 
00127 
00128    void Update_Text_PercentChange(); // Update control per current m_PercentChange.
00129    void Update_Slider_PercentChange(); // Update control per current m_PercentChange.
00130 
00131  private:
00132    EffectChangePitch * mEffect;
00133    bool m_bLoopDetect;
00134 
00135    // controls
00136    wxChoice *     m_pChoice_FromPitch;
00137    wxRadioButton *m_pRadioButton_PitchUp;
00138    wxRadioButton *m_pRadioButton_PitchDown;
00139    wxChoice *     m_pChoice_ToPitch;
00140    
00141    wxTextCtrl *   m_pTextCtrl_SemitonesChange;
00142 
00143    wxTextCtrl *   m_pTextCtrl_FromFrequency;
00144    wxTextCtrl *   m_pTextCtrl_ToFrequency;
00145    
00146    wxTextCtrl *   m_pTextCtrl_PercentChange;
00147    wxSlider *     m_pSlider_PercentChange;
00148 
00149  public:
00150    // effect parameters
00151    int      m_FromPitchIndex;    // pitch index, per PitchIndex
00152    bool     m_bWantPitchDown;    // up to ToPitchNum if false (default), else down
00153    int      m_ToPitchIndex;      // pitch index, per PitchIndex
00154 
00155    double   m_SemitonesChange;   // how many semitones to change pitch
00156    
00157    float    m_FromFrequency;     // starting frequency of selection
00158    float    m_ToFrequency;       // target frequency of selection
00159 
00160    double   m_PercentChange;     // percent change to apply to pitch
00161                                  // Slider is (-100, 200], but textCtrls can set higher.
00162 
00163  private:
00164    DECLARE_EVENT_TABLE()
00165 };
